titles.title: Tribal Healthcare Careers Act
Tribal Healthcare Careers Act
To provide a set-aside of funds for Indian populations under the health profession opportunity grant program under section 2008 of the Social Security Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
Tribal Healthcare Careers Act
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to reserve a portion of Health Profession Opportunity Grants for Indian tribes, tribal organizations, and tribal colleges and universities.
HHS must award at least 10 grants to tribal applicants.
